about_the_game:
Wicked Times is a straightforward role playing game which uses real photos to depict locations and enemies. It's a hero manager/autobattler type of game. As you face stronger and stronger enemies you are given a set of side activities to strengthen your character, which become essential as the game progresses. Buy potions to heal yourself. Upgrade your spell book to deal more damage and your armor to withstand the backlash of the monsters.
Awaiting are 60 enemies, 3 final bosses, 64 locations, 6 cities and 12 side activities to strengthen yourself before facing your enemies.
Buckle up for a journey to stop the demon Kugraltha and his minions.
detailed_description:
Wicked Times is a straightforward role playing game which uses real photos to depict locations and enemies. It's a hero manager/autobattler type of game. As you face stronger and stronger enemies you are given a set of side activities to strengthen your character, which become essential as the game progresses. Buy potions to heal yourself. Upgrade your spell book to deal more damage and your armor to withstand the backlash of the monsters.
Awaiting are 60 enemies, 3 final bosses, 64 locations, 6 cities and 12 side activities to strengthen yourself before facing your enemies.
Buckle up for a journey to stop the demon Kugraltha and his minions.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with metal support
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur 11
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with metal support
  • Storage: 270 MB available space

name: Wicked Times Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX11 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Wicked Times is an RPG manager/autobattler. Embark on a journey to stop the demon Kugraltha and his minions who occupy the lands. Collect gold. Upgrade your equipment. Find new towns and activities that give you extra experience and gold along the way.
